string-array.name: faq_questions_answers_s1_cat
string-array.item: I have pressed "Start" upload ok "sms, but I can not yet see the tracker.
Make sure the tracker is out. If it is in, it will have trouble connecting satellites. When the tracker gets in touch with the satellites, the blue light starts to flash.
I have pressed "Start, but I do not get sms response from the tracker.

Go to Settings-> Profile and enter country code and your phone number. Then go to Trackers-> and tap your tracker. Edit Tracker opens. Scroll down, and press the reset button. When you press the Reset button, five text messages will be sent. On Android phones, all five will be sent at once. On iPhone phones will sms The feature opens and you must send one by one. Then go back to the main menu and press "Start"
When I press the "Start" button in the app, nothing happens.

You have not chosen which tracker to start. Touch Trackers in the main menu. Then touch the small circle to the right of the tracker. Return to the main menu. The name of the tracker must now be above the "Start" button. Then press the "Start" button and The app will now send a text message to the tracker to start it.
I want to change how often the tracker sends the GPS signal.

Go to Trackers and tap the track you want to change the signal frequency. Scroll down to "Signal". Press the time shown under "Signal" and change it to the desired length. Press "Update". Return to the main menu and press "Start".
I only see GPS positions for the last part of the trip.
You can set the length of tracking your history by going to the head menu-> Settings-> Viewing options. Select the desired time and press save. You will now see GPS positions within this time frame.
I want to see my friend\'s tracker

Go to Settings-Connect and tap the "+" character in the top right corner. Search your friend\'s username and press "+". Your friend will now get your username below his "connect to" list. He must then add you by touching the "+" character next to it your name. In order for you to see his tracker, he must touch the "Eye" icon next to it your name. The "eye" icon will then turn green.
I want to stop my friend from seeing my tracker.
Go to Settings-> Connect and touch the "Eye" icon. Eye icon will change from green to gray and get a line through. Your friend can no longer see your tracker.
I want my friend\'s tracker but I say I have to pay for it
If you do not own a tracker registered in your username, you must pay a small amount sum of the month to see it. You can stop payment when you wish.
I will put my tracker subscription on hold.
Go to Settings and press "Pause subscription". An email will then be sent to GPS Ping and we cancel the subscription.
The tracker\'s position is in the middle of the ocean.
This means that the tracker has not updated his GPS position and has not received satellite contact. Take the tracker out and restart it by pressing the on and off button.
I want to stop the subscription I purchased in the app to see my friend\'s tracker.

This must be stopped in Apple App Store or in the Google Play Store. For iPhone go to App Store the app and scroll down to your user. Touch your apple ID and then view the View ID. Enter your password, go to subscriptions and press adminstrer. There you can stop subscription. On Android: Open the Google Play store on your phone. Go to My Apps via Google Play store menu. On the left side of installed apps is a list of your subscriptions. Here you can select the subscription you want to stop.
I can not see my own position.
This means that you have not granted the app access to the GPS feature on the phone. Go to settings on your phone and provide the GPS Ping app access.
I want to rename the tracker
Go to Trackers and hit your tracker. Edit Tracker will open. Here you can enter the name of the tracker under "Name"
How can I see the daily log of the tracker
Go to Log and tap the calendar in the top right corner. Select the current date and the app will pick up GPS positions for that date.
How do I find north on the map
Open Map and Track and put two fingers on the map and twist. A compass will come up on the left side of the screen. This compass shows north on the map.
What shows the compass that is always on the map.
This compass really shows the North.
How many trackers can I have in the app
You can buy and watch as many trackers as you want.
How is the ON / OFF button
This button is on the edge / side of the tracker. Hold it for at least three seconds.
How do I see if the tracker has GPS Signal
Press the ON / OFF button to bring up the screen. If you have a circle inside the wheel On screen, then you have GPS Signal.
Hvordan kan jeg ringe til trackeren
Tap last post in the map. Touch the call icon.
